title: Protecting the Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/10/18
itunes:title: Protecting the Grid - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/10/18
description:
Dr. Peter Vincent Pry of Task Force on National and Homeland Security explains how vulnerable the US power grid is to EMP attacks and the devastating effects that would ensue.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
